forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing later in the day. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
